$wpApiCustom
service in module wp-api-angularjs

Description

Custom entity

Dependencies

  • $injector

Methods

  • getInstance(entityName)

    Get page list

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    entityNamestring

    The name of the entity to fetch

    Returns
    Object

    Entity instance. You can use get and getList methods the same way as other entities

    Example

    var cars = $wpApiCustom.getInstance('cars');
cars.getList();
cars.get(666);
